entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to flurries at times heavy and ending near midnight then clearing. Risk of snow squalls late this evening. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
